title: GUILTY PLEASURES: Personal And Business
description: Two beautiful women's personal and legal worlds are thrown into sexual spins when a handsome stranger calling himself Daniel Tucker arrives in their city of Tampa, Florida and turns the heat up for them. Jessie Rogers and Samantha Morton are two young and beautiful criminal defense attorneys who don't care for each other but find they may care a great deal for the enigmatic Daniel Tucker who seduces them. They each find themselves weighing the evidence and examining the case the mysterious stranger makes personally with them, and love and sex has them all feeling and doing things they never would confess to. Right and wrong are personal pleasures and guilty pleasures he specializes in and they all are judging each other until the verdict comes in.
author: Alvin Slater
